name: Tower Jump - Ninja Flip
description:
Ninja flip is super simple to learn yet insanely addictive to play. Touch the screen and hold it down to hold the power and release it to super jump.
It is a free game of reflexes and skill

-The control is very simple slide your fingers on the screen to rotate the tower and cross the labyrinth.

Features of Ninja flip & Tower jump

# Easy one tap controls.
# Jumping easy free jump game app.
# Multiple levels of tower jump game or colorful graphic.
# User friendly game playing.
# Simple and classic game that you can play anywhere.
# Great music and intense sound effects of a jump.
